Interface Library

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibraryImpl, LibraryMock

    public interface Library
    Libraries have a name set at construction time. They also have a maximum number of books that can be borrowed by a user at any one time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBook(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author)
      Adds a new book to the list of books in this library.
      int getBookBorrowedCount() 
      int getBookCount() 
      int getID(java.lang.String name)
      returns the user ID if the person does not yet have an ID, a new unique ID is created and returned.
      int getMaxBooksPerUser() 
      java.lang.String getName()
      returns the library name
      int getReaderCount() 
      void returnBook(Books book)
      Marks the book as not taken.
      Books takeBook(java.lang.String title)
      If the book is not taken, marks the book as taken and returns it.

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        int getID(java.lang.String name)
        returns the user ID if the person does not yet have an ID, a new unique ID is created and returned. any subsequent calls to the method with the same name argument should return the same ID.
        Parameters:
        name - String name of the user
        Returns:
        the user ID

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        returns the library name
        Returns:
        the libray name

      • getMaxBooksPerUser

        int getMaxBooksPerUser()
        Returns:
        the maximum number of books a user can borrow at a time

      • addBook

        void addBook(java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String author)
        Adds a new book to the list of books in this library.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the book.
        author - the author of the book.

      • takeBook

        Books takeBook(java.lang.String title)
        If the book is not taken, marks the book as taken and returns it. If the book is taken or does not exist, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the book.
        Returns:
        the book if it is not taken or null if it is.

      • returnBook

        void returnBook(Books book)
        Marks the book as not taken.
        Parameters:
        book - the book being returned.

      • getReaderCount

        int getReaderCount()
        Returns:
        the number of users registered in this library.

      • getBookCount

        int getBookCount()
        Returns:
        the number of books in this library.

      • getBookBorrowedCount

        int getBookBorrowedCount()
        Returns:
        the number of borrowed books in this library.
